bill.title: Abortion Complication Reporting Act; require certain professionals to report treatment for emotional trauma.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 41-41-77, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Revise The Abortion Complication Reporting Act To Require Psychiatrists, Other Physicians And Psychologists To File A Written Report With The State Department Of Health Regarding Each Patient Who Comes Under The Professional Care Of The Physician Or Psychologist And Requires Treatment For Emotional Trauma; To Amend Sections 41-41-78 And 41-41-79, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform To The Preceding Provision; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services
